name: Christmas Rewind Master
description:
It is the end of the year. Christmas and New Year's Eve are coming by, and you just can not wait to be there.

But as time goes by, you notice something off. A feeling of déjà vu. Everything you do is just so familiar...

You have to escape this loop or Christmas will never come! 

Christmas Rewind Master is a first person puzzle game in which you will have to solve enigmas in order to eventually escape the time loop you're trapped in. Take advantage of the situation and rewind your last actions to overcome your obstacles!

Take the time to look around, find clues, and solve the mystery by exploring it. 

TBD

Producer : Alexandre CLEMENT

Artists : Kimberley PRUNIER - Eliott PINEDA

Programmers : Julien SADARNAC -  Alexandre SANCHES - Antoine ESBELIN

Game Designers : Hugo MONMOUSSEAU - Chloé MORIN
